Anthropic Launches Claude 4 with Record 72.7% SWE-bench Score
articles.content: Anthropic has released Claude 4 Opus and Sonnet models, achieving a record-breaking 72.7% score on SWE-bench Verified, far exceeding previous benchmarks.
articles.summary: Anthropic has released Claude 4 Opus and Sonnet models, achieving a record-breaking 72.7% score on SWE-bench Verified, far exceeding previous benchmarks.

articles.title: Claude 4 Opus Achieves New SWE-bench Record with 73.20% Score
articles.content: Anthropic's Claude 4 Opus has set a new benchmark record on SWE-bench Verified, achieving 73.20% and establishing itself as the leading autonomous coding model.
articles.summary: Anthropic's Claude 4 Opus has set a new benchmark record on SWE-bench Verified, achieving 73.20% and establishing itself as the leading autonomous coding model.

articles.title: Google Unveils Jules AI Coding Agent at I/O 2025
articles.content: Google announced Jules, an autonomous AI coding agent powered by Gemini 2.5 Pro, achieving 52.2% on SWE-bench Verified during public beta launch.
articles.summary: Google announced Jules, an autonomous AI coding agent powered by Gemini 2.5 Pro, achieving 52.2% on SWE-bench Verified during public beta launch.

articles.title: Vercel v0 Updates Pricing Model to Token-Based Credit System
articles.content: Vercel updated v0's pricing structure in May 2025, transitioning from fixed message counts to a token-based credit system. The new model includes $5 in credits for free tier, $20 for premium, and $30 per user for team tier.
articles.summary: Vercel updated v0's pricing structure in May 2025, transitioning from fixed message counts to a token-based credit system. The new model includes $5 in credits for free tier, $20 for premium, and $30 per user for team tier.

articles.title: GitHub Copilot Coding Agent for Autonomous Issue Resolution
articles.content: GitHub introduces Copilot Coding Agent capable of autonomously resolving GitHub issues, marking a major step toward AI-driven software development.
articles.summary: GitHub introduces Copilot Coding Agent capable of autonomously resolving GitHub issues, marking a major step toward AI-driven software development....

articles.title: Vercel Releases First Dedicated AI Model v0-1.0-md for Web Development
articles.content: Vercel announced the release of its first dedicated AI model, v0-1.0-md, specifically designed for building modern web applications. The multimodal model supports text and image inputs, offers 128,000-token context window, and is priced at $3 per million input tokens.
articles.summary: Vercel announced the release of its first dedicated AI model, v0-1.0-md, specifically designed for building modern web applications. The multimodal model supports text and image inputs, offers 128,000-token context window, and is priced at $3 per million input tokens.

articles.title: May 2025 - by Nathan Benaich - Your guide to AI
articles.content: P-1 AI, a startup developing AI-powered engineering assistants, raised a $23M seed financing round from Radical Ventures, Village Global, and Schematic Ventures.
articles.summary: P-1 AI, a startup developing AI-powered engineering assistants, raised a $23M seed financing round from Radical Ventures, Village Global, and Schematic Ventures.

articles.title: Anysphere's $900M Funding Boosts Cursor: Top AI Coding Tool 2025
articles.content: Anysphere's $900M funding fuels Cursor, the AI-powered code editor revolutionizing developer productivity in 2025. The funding will likely fuel feature expansion, scalability, R&D, and community building.
articles.summary: Anysphere's $900M funding fuels Cursor, the AI-powered code editor revolutionizing developer productivity in 2025. The funding will likely fuel feature expansion, scalability, R&D, and community building.

articles.title: OpenAI Acquires Windsurf for $3 Billion
articles.content: OpenAI has completed its acquisition of Windsurf (formerly Codeium) for $3 billion, marking one of the largest AI tooling acquisitions to date.
articles.summary: OpenAI has completed its acquisition of Windsurf (formerly Codeium) for $3 billion, marking one of the largest AI tooling acquisitions to date.

articles.title: Augment Code Becomes First AI Coding Assistant to Achieve ISO/IEC 42001 Certification
articles.content: Augment Code achieves ISO/IEC 42001 certification, becoming the first AI coding assistant to meet international standards for AI management systems, addressing enterprise security concerns.
articles.summary: Augment Code achieves ISO/IEC 42001 certification, becoming the first AI coding assistant to meet international standards for AI management systems, addressing enterprise security concerns.
